original_title: Roland Gori, une époque sans esprit
overview: Today we live in a world where the logic of profitability applies to all fields. The places dedicated to the professions of care, social work, education... are managed by managers or experts for whom only figures count, denying human needs. The psychoanalyst Roland Gori has been fighting for years against the disintegration of our society. This film is a portrait of his thought, of his commitment.
title: Roland Gori, une époque sans esprit
